other_tests.findings: Partially imaged small to moderate right and small left pleural effusions with overlying atelectasis. Mitral annulus calcification is seen. Small pericardial effusion is re-demonstrated. Suggestion of possible periportal edema in the liver with no evidence of biliary dilatation. Renal transplant kidney contains a 3 cm parapelvic cyst and the renal pelvis is mildly dilated. There is focal wall thickening and stranding along the hepatic flexure worrisome for focal colitis. Colonic diverticulosis is seen throughout the colon.
